text:
[Verse]
Wake up it's a new day
Sun's rising up
Colors in the sky play
Time to fill our cup

[Verse 2]
Birds singing softly
Wind whispers your name
Morning light it calls me
Nothing feels the same

[Chorus]
Sunrise dreams come alive
Chasing light til we thrive
In that glow we believe
Sunrise dreams can't deceive

[Verse 3]
Steps into the morning
Path clear and bright
Every heartbeat warming
Guided by the light

[Bridge]
Hold on to the sunshine
Feel the world in rhyme
Dreams unfold in daytime
It's our moment prime

[Chorus]
Sunrise dreams come alive
Chasing light til we thrive
In that glow we believe
Sunrise dreams can't deceive
title: Sunrise Dreams
